# setItems(_:options:)

**Instance Method**

Adds an array of items to a pasteboard, and sets privacy options for all the items on the pasteboard.

## Declaration

```swift
func setItems(_ items: [[String : Any]], options: [UIPasteboard.OptionsKey : Any] = [:])
```

## Parameters

- **items**: An array of items to add to the pasteboard.
- **options**: The privacy options to apply to all the items on the pasteboard. The available options are described in [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPasteboard/OptionsKey].

## Getting and setting pasteboard items

- **numberOfItems**: The number of items for the pasteboard.
- **items**: The pasteboard items on the pasteboard.
- **addItems(_:)**: Appends pasteboard items to the current contents of the pasteboard.
- **data(forPasteboardType:)**: Returns the data on the pasteboard for the given representation type.
- **data(forPasteboardType:inItemSet:)**: Returns the data objects in the indicated pasteboard items that have the given representation type.
- **setData(_:forPasteboardType:)**: Puts data on the pasteboard for the specified representation type.
- **value(forPasteboardType:)**: Returns an object on the pasteboard for the given representation type.
- **values(forPasteboardType:inItemSet:)**: Returns the objects on the indicated pasteboard items that have the given representation type.
- **setValue(_:forPasteboardType:)**: Puts an object on the pasteboard for the specified representation type.
